title: wtfm

title: projects
content: projects Things I've built. Some finished, some not. ineqpy Python library for inequality and poverty metrics. title: Untitled
content: Load local nvim config from local files: `:help exrc`(https://neovim.io/doc/user/options.html'exrc') ```lua init.lua vim.opt.exrc = true vim.opt.secure = true ``` Files: `.nvim.lua` > `.nvimrc` > `.exrc` ```lua .nvim.lua / .nvimrc / .exrc vim.print("hello from local rc") ```
